original_text:
Can a corrupt throne be allied with you—
    a throne that brings on misery by its decrees?
korean_text: 율례를 빙자하고 재난을 꾸미는 악한 재판장이 어찌 주와 어울리리이까

sentences.original_text: Can a corrupt throne be allied with you—
sentences.korean_translation: 부패한 왕좌가 당신과 동맹을 맺을 수 있겠습니까—

sentences.original_text: a throne that brings on misery
